दैनिक प्रार्थना.sanskrit:
कराग्रे वसते लक्ष्मीः करमध्ये सरस्वती।
करमूले तु गोविन्दः प्रभाते करदर्शनम्॥
दैनिक प्रार्थना.transliteration:
Karāgre Vasate Lakṣhmīḥ Karamadhye Sarasvatī,
Karamūle Tu Govindaḥ Prabhāte Karadarśanam.
दैनिक प्रार्थना.english: On the tip of my fingers resides Goddess Lakshmi, in the middle resides Goddess Saraswati, and at the base resides Lord Govinda (Vishnu). Therefore, one should look at the palms every morning.

Evening Prayer.sanskrit:
राम रामेति रामेति रमे रामे मनोरमे।
सहस्रनाम तत्तुल्यं रामनाम वरानने॥
Evening Prayer.transliteration:
Rāma Rāmeti Rāmeti Rame Rāme Manorame,
Sahasranāma Tattulyaṁ Rāmanāma Varānane.
Evening Prayer.english: Chanting the name of Lord Rama is as meritorious as reciting the thousand names of Lord Vishnu (Vishnu Sahasranama).

Bhojan Mantra (Before Meals).sanskrit:
ब्रह्मार्पणं ब्रह्म हविर्ब्रह्माग्नौ ब्रह्मणा हुतम्।
ब्रह्मैव तेन गन्तव्यं ब्रह्मकर्मसमाधिना॥
Bhojan Mantra (Before Meals).transliteration:
Brahmārpaṇaṁ Brahma Havir Brahmāgnau Brahmaṇā Hutam,
Brahmaiva Tena Gantavyaṁ Brahmakarma Samādhinā.
Bhojan Mantra (Before Meals).english: The act of offering is Brahman, the oblation is Brahman, offered by Brahman into the fire of Brahman. By seeing Brahman in every action, one attains Brahman alone.

Bhojan Mantra (After Meals).english: May the one who provided this food be happy and blessed.

Night Prayer.sanskrit:
करचरण कृतं वाक्कायजं कर्मजं वा।
श्रवणनयनजं वा मानसं वापराधम्।
विहितमविहितं वा सर्वमेतत्क्षमस्व।
जय जय करुणाब्धे श्रीमहादेव शम्भो॥
Night Prayer.transliteration:
Karacaraṇa Kṛtaṁ Vāk Kāyajaṁ Karmajaṁ Vā,
Śravaṇa-Nayana-jaṁ Vā Mānasaṁ Vāparādham,
Vihitam Avihitaṁ Vā Sarvametat Kṣamasva,
Jaya Jaya Karuṇābdhe Śrīmahādeva Śambho.
Night Prayer.english: O Lord Shambhu, ocean of compassion! Whatever sins I may have committed with my hands, feet, speech, body, actions, ears, eyes, or mind — whether prescribed or not prescribed — please forgive them all. Victory to You!
